title.value: Biopreparations aurin and nemacide protect Petroselinum crispum against Alternaria Petroselini
Защита растений петрушки (Petroselinum crispum) от альтернариоза биопрепаратами Стимул и Аурин

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kuleshova, Yu.M., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Apalko, E.V., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus it was established, that biopreparations Aurin and Nemacide protect Petroselinum crispum against Alternaria petroselini and decrease plant diseases. It was found that biological preparations Stimul and Aurine rendered a protective effect in a model system of artificial infection of plants parsley with A. petroselini spores. One of the mechanisms of phytoprotective activity of the biological preparations was the ability of bacteria P. fluorescens and P. aurantiaca, being within them, to synthesize intra- and extracellular metabolites inducing systemic resistance to pathogens of parsley Alternaria. Eliciting activity is retained after drying of the studied biopreparations at hightened temperatures. Among the investigated phytoprotective agents the most pronounced biological activity was recorded in the solution of the dried mixture and biological preparations Stimul and Aurine.
